scripts.build: rm -rf server/dist && npm -w client run build -- --mode ${npm_config_mode} --emptyOutDir --outDir ../server/dist
scripts.deploy: git switch main && git pull origin main --rebase --tags && git merge origin staging && npm version $npm_config_level && git push origin main --tags && git switch staging
scripts.preview: npm run build --mode=${npm_config_mode} && npm -w server start
